original: Nasavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa vitakkam dhammam paṭicca na sa vitakkaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na avitakkam dhammam paṭicca na avitakkaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nasavitakkañca naavitakkañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa vitakkam ca na avitakkam ca dhammam paṭicca na sa vitakkaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava
